mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ticket_order (ticket_id, user_id, num, order_num) VALUES (#{ticketId}, #{userId}, #{num}, #{orderNum})
mapper.select: select id, ticket_id ticketId, user_id userId, num, order_num orderNum from ticket_order;

SELECT o.id, t.start_station startStation,t.stop_station stopStation, u.user_name userName, o.num, o.order_num orderNum FROM ticket_order as o LEFT JOIN ticket t ON (o.ticket_id=t.id) LEFT JOIN `user` u ON (o.user_id = u.id)
